entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 40 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
